overview: Alicja is counting weeks to the birth of her daughter. She’s looking forward not only to her child but also to her husband, who works abroad. Oksana, a young Ukrainian, arrives to help her bring the long-awaited daughter to the world, but their life under the same roof is becoming harder than they expected.

production_companies.name: Szkoła Filmowa im. Krzysztofa Kieślowskiego Uniwersytetu Śląskiego

title: Delivery
